DIA_Jens_Hello_13_00: Another scumbag who can't respect someone else's property!
DIA_Jens_Hello_13_03: YOU STILL HAVE THE NERVE TO ASK?
DIA_Jens_Hello_13_04: You brought so much mud into my house I've never seen anything like it in my life. By Adanos!
DIA_Jens_Hello_13_05: And you're going to clean it up for me now, or I will slam you into the wall.
DIA_Jens_Hello_NO_13_01: In that case, you leave me no choice, you bastard. Defend yourself!
DIA_Jens_Hello_YES_13_01: Grab a brush and get to work.
DIA_Jens_Hello_YES_13_02: Just don't grumble too long. I'm supposed to see a clean floor here in a few minutes.
DIA_Jens_Afterwashing_13_01: I understand. You guys are not all that worthless after all!
DIA_Jens_Afterwashing_13_02: In return for doing your best, here are a few gold pieces as an incentive.
DIA_Jens_WELCOME_03_03: Say what you want or leave me alone.
DIA_Jens_Talk_15_01: You're not very talkative, are you?
DIA_Jens_Talk_03_02: Not when I have to answer stupid questions like yours.
DIA_Jens_Ambient_03_02: Will you let me work in peace, or should I go after the sentry?
DIA_Jens_Ambient_03_03: I don't want to talk to you, newbie.
